guide you through modules and projects so you can get started with Cloudflare as quickly as possible.     Application Security  Learn more about the tools Cloudflare offers to protect your website against malicious traffic and bad actors.
     Project Cybersafe Schools  Prevent children from accessing obscene or harmful content over the Internet. Go to Project Cybersafe Schools to apply.
     Get started (Free plan)  Learn how you can get the most out of your Free plan.
     Get started with Cloudflare  Set up your application to benefit from Cloudflareâ€™s speed, security, and reliability.
     Load balancing  Maximize application performance and availability.
     Prevent DDoS attacks  Protect your application from distributed (DDoS) and regular denial of service (DoS) attacks.
     Replace your VPN  Give users secure, auditable network and application access.
     Secure your Internet traffic and SaaS apps  Provide your users and networks with a secure, performant, and flexible path to the Internet.
     Build applications with Cloudflare Workers  Deploy serverless code, globally with exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.
     Deploy Zero Trust Web Access  Secure access to internal web applications without a device client.
